hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #0# major items.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #0# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Serenade of Water#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a lone #scrub in Death Mountain Crater# sells #the Weird Egg#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Carpenters' Boss House#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I came here to chew bubblegum and play rando. And I'm all out of bubblegum.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly GS Water Switch Room

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that Epona is an exceptional horse. Able to clear canyons in a single bound.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Temple of Time# chimes with the music of #a Map of Dodongo's Cavern#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Remember when Ganon was a blue pig?^I remember.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Deku Stick#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to the #Light Medallion#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Saria's Song# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #an Ice Trap#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #time#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Level Island Courtyard

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

SFM (Saria).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Impa's House#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Requiem of Spirit# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

ZF (Jabu).text: You're comparing yourself to me?^Ha! You're not even good enough to be my fake.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Magic Beans#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.
